meanings.definition: A sentimental longing or wistful affection for the past.
meanings.sent1: The old photo album filled her with nostalgic memories.
meanings.sent2: She felt nostalgic when she found her childhood toy in the attic.
meanings.sent3: Looking at her favorite childhood book made her feel nostalgic.
meanings.sent4: The smell of freshly baked cookies was a nostalgic reminder of her grandmother's kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the ice cream truck brought a wave of nostalgic happiness.

meanings.sent1: The nostalgic music reminded him of his school days.
meanings.sent2: The old movie theater had a nostalgic charm.
meanings.sent3: His nostalgic love for retro video games was evident in his collection.
meanings.sent4: The vintage dress had a nostalgic feel to it.
meanings.sent5: The nostalgic atmosphere of the small town was comforting.
